channel.title: Comments on: Cleaning Your Brushes: Bacteria and YOU!

item.title: By: Steph Suzi Strickling
item.dc:creator: Steph Suzi Strickling
item.description:

This is exactly why I like you. Genius! :)

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/cleaning-brushes-bacteria/#comment-508">Steph Suzi Strickling</a>.
If you keep killing the top layer, you never get a bottom layer, right?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Steph Suzi Strickling.

If you keep killing the top layer, you never get a bottom layer, right?

item.title: By: Steph Suzi Strickling
item.dc:creator: Steph Suzi Strickling
item.description: I'm terrible about this, I admit it. I tend to hit them up every month or so for cleaning. I go the baby shampoo route, only because I'm super cheap, but it seems to do the trick. I did spring for the daily brush cleaner spray from Sephora though, so I spritz them with that around once a week. It dries super quick, and I tell myself that it's killing at least the top layer of bacteria...
item.content:encoded: I’m terrible about this, I admit it. I tend to hit them up every month or so for cleaning. I go the baby shampoo route, only because I’m super cheap, but it seems to do the trick. I did spring for the daily brush cleaner spray from Sephora though, so I spritz them with that around once a week. It dries super quick, and I tell myself that it’s killing at least the top layer of bacteria…

item.title: By: Erin-Kurley
item.dc:creator: Erin-Kurley
item.description: Ugh, you read my mind with this one! I've been putting this off for so long. I got that brush shampoo a while ago, and after washing my brushes with it, I thought, "That was so easy! I'm going to wash my brushes all the time!" NOPE! I guess I need to stop putting it off...
item.content:encoded: Ugh, you read my mind with this one! I’ve been putting this off for so long. I got that brush shampoo a while ago, and after washing my brushes with it, I thought, “That was so easy! I’m going to wash my brushes all the time!” NOPE! I guess I need to stop putting it off…
